#### HeroSystem 6e character sheet

This sheet is for the HeroSystems 6e gaming system, also known as Champions.

Instructions for using this sheet can be viewed [here](https://github.com/Roll20/roll20-character-sheets/blob/master/HeroSystem6e/README.md).

This sheet is designed to be used with the [HeroSystem6e API](https://github.com/Roll20/roll20-api-scripts/tree/master/HeroSystem6e).  While this api is not required, you will lose out on intended functionality if you don't use it.  The api can be added via a game's Settings / API Scripts page.

I would also recommend using the [HeroTracker API](https://github.com/Roll20/roll20-api-scripts/tree/master/HeroTracker).  This api is compatible with this character sheet and adds some useful features for handling the HeroSystem turn mechanics (segments/phases).
